block_comment: This block scales the input 'display_data' based on the value of the 'scale' variable. It implements this by using a case statement which changes the 'display_data_scaled' variable according to the value of 'scale'. Each value of 'scale' from 0 to 15 causes a different bit to be repeated (between 2 and 16 times) from 'display_data[15]', creating a scaling effect on 'display_data'. The subtended bits from 'display_data[14:0]' are appended to form 'display_data_scaled'.
